owner.description: Signer of the manifest. Needs to match the owner of the container.

type.description: Storage backend. The manifest should contain backend-specific parameters

container-path.description: Path identifying the container this storage is for (by convention, /.uuid/...)

trusted.description: Allow loading unsigned manifests (for the same owner) from this storage

manifest-pattern.description: A strategy for finding manifests in this storage, based on path.

path.description: An absolute path that can contain '*' and '{path}'. Default is '/{path}.yaml'.
